title: The Weight of a Name
description: A speculative fiction novel exploring identity, memory, and the power of names in a post-apocalyptic world.
pitch: In a world where names hold power and memory is currency, one person's quest to reclaim their identity challenges the very fabric of society.
challenge: Balancing complex world-building with character development while maintaining narrative tension throughout a 300-page novel.
development: Three-year writing process including extensive world-building, character development, and multiple revision cycles.
outcome: Completed manuscript of 85,000 words, currently seeking publication. Received positive feedback from beta readers and writing groups.
